original_title: When Slippery Slim Went for the Eggs
overview: When eggs went up to $6 a dozen, Slim and Sophie try in every way to make their hen lay, but with no success. Mustang sees their efforts and decides to play a joke. One morning Slim receives a letter telling him that giving hens hot water to drink and putting salt on their tails will make them lay.
title: When Slippery Slim Went for the Eggs
